column2: Royce Global Value Trust Inc. (the Fund) is a diversified closed-end investment company. The Fund invests primarily in dividend-paying companies. The Fund invest in both the United States (U.S) and non-U.S. small-cap stocks. The Fund invests in various industrial sectors, which include information technology (IT), financials, health care, materials, real estate, consumer staples, consumer discretionary, energy and communication sectors. Royce & Associates, LP is the Fundâ€™s investment adviser.
